remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许公共语言运行时封送使用正确的大小。The class allows the common language runtime to marshal using the correct sizes. 公共语言运行时的某些行为是与某些语言不兼容。Some behaviors of the common language runtime are incompatible with some languages. 公共语言运行时将它们封送为 4 字节值，以匹配时，c + + 例如，将视为单字节值的布尔变量`BOOLEAN`Microsoft Win32 API 定义的类型。For example, C++ treats Boolean variables as single-byte values, while the common language runtime marshals them as four-byte values to match the `BOOLEAN` type defined by the Microsoft Win32 API. 若要解决此类问题，c + + 编译器将发出此修饰符对任何`wchar_t`或`bool`参数或函数返回。To work around such issues, the C++ compiler emits this modifier on any `wchar_t` or `bool` parameter or function return.
